scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "BACKEND,STREAMS,UI,API" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta,green,yellow" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:stream-processor" "wait-on http://localhost:8080/q/health && vite" "wait-on http://localhost:8080/q/health && npm run api:watch"
scripts.dev:full: npm run dev:db && npm run dev
scripts.dev:rust: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "BACKEND,STREAMS,UI,API" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta,green,yellow" "npm run dev:rust:backend" "npm run dev:rust:stream-processor" "wait-on http://localhost:9090/health && vite" "wait-on http://localhost:9090/health && npm run api:watch"
scripts.dev:rust:backend: cd ../../flowcatalyst-rust && FC_DEV_MODE=true FC_MONGO_URL='mongodb://localhost:27017/?replicaSet=rs0&directConnection=true' FC_MONGO_DB=flowcatalyst FC_API_PORT=8080 FC_METRICS_PORT=9090 RUST_LOG=info cargo watch -x 'run -p fc-platform-server'
scripts.dev:rust:stream-processor: wait-on http://localhost:9090/health && cd ../../flowcatalyst-rust && FC_MONGO_URL='mongodb://localhost:27017/?replicaSet=rs0&directConnection=true' FC_MONGO_DB=flowcatalyst FC_METRICS_PORT=9091 RUST_LOG=info cargo watch -x 'run -p fc-stream-processor'
scripts.dev:rust:full: npm run dev:db && sleep 5 && npm run dev:rust
scripts.dev:go: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names "BACKEND,STREAMS,UI,API" --prefix-colors "blue,magenta,green,yellow" "npm run dev:go:backend" "npm run dev:go:stream-processor" "wait-on http://localhost:8080/q/health && vite" "wait-on http://localhost:8080/q/health && npm run api:watch"
scripts.dev:go:backend: cd ../../flowcatalyst-go && FLOWCATALYST_DEV=true MONGODB_URI='mongodb://localhost:27017/?replicaSet=rs0&directConnection=true' MONGODB_DATABASE=flowcatalyst HTTP_PORT=8080 go run ./cmd/platform
scripts.dev:go:stream-processor: wait-on http://localhost:8080/q/health && cd ../../flowcatalyst-go && FLOWCATALYST_DEV=true MONGODB_URI='mongodb://localhost:27017/?replicaSet=rs0&directConnection=true' MONGODB_DATABASE=flowcatalyst HTTP_PORT=8082 go run ./cmd/stream
scripts.dev:go:full: npm run dev:db && sleep 5 && npm run dev:go
scripts.build: npm run api:generate && vue-tsc -b && vite build
